title: Long Rest
content:
the Mini Map. A Camp will automatically be set up in a nearby safe-area. Interacting with a bedroll, the campfire, or using the Long Rest button again ends the day and restores all of the following:

All Hit Points up to your maximum. All Short Rest uses. All Spell Slots. All Class Actions. All Item Actions.

Partial Long Rest

Alternatively, a Partial Long Rest is performed by expending less than the required amount of Camp Supplies. A partial rest will only restore the following:

Half your Hi
